I am a #scientist studying how stressed cells in our body talk to other cells when tumours arise and when we age. Specifically, I look at how variations in the cellular stress response #senescence shape health using highly multiplexed imaging.
Problem solving using #Rstats keeps me happy, and the #OpenScience movement gives me faith that not all is lost in academia. You might find me wandering through greenhouses, reminiscing about #Morrowind or avenging Jean-Baptiste de Lamarck.
